original_text: Abijah and his troops inflicted heavy losses on them, so that there were five hundred thousand casualties among Israel’s able men.
korean_text: 아비야와 그의 백성이 크게 무찌르니 이스라엘이 택한 병사들이 죽임을 당하고 엎드러진 자들이 오십만 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: Abijah and his troops inflicted heavy losses on them
sentences.korean_translation: 아비야와 그의 군대가 그들에게 큰 손실을 입혔으니

sentences.original_text: so that there were five hundred thousand casualties
